Management

类 HotelManagement_CD

  • java.lang.Object
    • Management.HotelManagement_CD

  • public class HotelManagement_CD
extends Object
    Management class for check-in/out and expense calculation and so on

        public List<Room_CD> getAllRooms()
                          throws ParseException
        get all rooms from database
        返回:
        list of rooms
        抛出:
        ParseException - date formatting exception

      • getCheckedRooms

        public List<Room_CD> getCheckedRooms()
                              throws ParseException
        get all rooms at 'checkin' state from database
        返回:
        list of rooms
        抛出:
        ParseException - date formatting exception

      • findCustomerById

        public Customer_CD findCustomerById(int id)
        find customer by id number
        参数:
        id - id number
        返回:
        customer

      • init

        public void init()
        initialize room database, used only once at the very beginning 50 rooms in total, 10 presidential suites (No.1 to 10), 20 standard rooms (No.11 to 30), 20 single rooms (No.31 to 50)

      • findRoom

        public Room_CD findRoom(int roomNumber)
                 throws ParseException
        find certain room by room number
        参数:
        roomNumber - room number
        返回:
        room
        抛出:
        ParseException

      • findRoomsAbleToLive

        public List<Room_CD> findRoomsAbleToLive(String roomType)
        find rooms that are able to be lived in by type (number of customer at present is not full)
        参数:
        roomType - type of room. Whether single, standard or presidential
        返回:
        room

      • checkIn

        public void checkIn(String customerName,
                    int customerId,
                    Room_CD room,
                    String checkInDate)
        check-in operation
        参数:
        customerName - customer's name
        customerId - customer's id
        room - number of the room the customer will live in
        checkInDate - date of check-in

      • calculateDays

        private int calculateDays(String checkInDate,
                          String checkOutDate)
        calculate dates from check-in to checkout
        参数:
        checkInDate - check-in date
        checkOutDate - checkout date
        返回:
        days

      • checkOut

        public void checkOut(int roomNumber,
                     String checkOutDate)
        checkout operation
        参数:
        roomNumber - the number of room that will be checked out
        checkOutDate - the date of checkout

      • isAdminLogin

        public boolean isAdminLogin(String account,
                            String password)
        whether the administrator logged in successfully
        参数:
        account - admin's account
        password - admin's password
        返回:
        if login successfully, return true, else false

      • closeAll

        private void closeAll()
        close all connection to database
